thread.title: 2 night stay in March '17
thread.title_full: 2 night stay in March '17 - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: taylorh235
title: 2 night stay in March '17
text: We were extremely happy with the room rate we got and the location of the hotel! It was perfect for our stay. The only thing I would say was our room was really warm and we don't believe the heat was on, we actually had to turn the ac fan on for a while to cool down the room. Other than that, the room was great and the staff was really nice! Thank you!
